Posts.EditableText:
Hey Alex,

I tried to PM you but it would not let me??

I have used Quest to create a small little program to help my team here at work know what kind of system they need to install for a customer.

Can you help me turn this into an app for phones?

Thanks bro

Posts.EditableText: I turned off PMs as it turned out my email inbox was a much better way of getting me to remember to reply to things! alex@textadventures.co.uk. Send me an email if you need more info on app conversion - note that I recently updated the apps page to clarify costs etc: http://textadventures.co.uk/services/apps For the self-service option, the HTML/JS converter for Quest is available on Github at https://github.com/textadventures/quest
Posts.HTML:
I turned off PMs as it turned out my email inbox was a much better way of getting me to remember to reply to things! alex@textadventures.co.uk.

Send me an email if you need more info on app conversion - note that I recently updated the apps page to clarify costs etc: http://textadventures.co.uk/services/apps

For the self-service option, the HTML/JS converter for Quest is available on Github at https://github.com/textadventures/quest
